analysis.description:
Escrow.doWithdraw (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#204-208) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! beneficiary.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#205-207)

Reentrancy in ArtSale.doPayment (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#884-904):
	External calls:
	- ! token.mint(_subscriber,purchasedTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#896-897)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! escrow.send(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#895-896)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSubscription (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#902-904)
Artcoin.isContract (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#692-701) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#129-135) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#134-135)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#212-246) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#230-235)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#248-256) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#254-255)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#255-256)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#265-318) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#272-281)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#285-295)

LimitedTransferToken (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#390-432) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#403-405)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#410-413)

MintableToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#341-342) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#129-130)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#78-85) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

VestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#595) shadows:
	- VestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#632-639)

Reentrancy in ArtSale.doFinalizeSale (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#923-942):
	External calls:
	- purchasedTokens = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#926-927)
	- ! token.mint(operations,advisorTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#931-934)
	- ! token.mint(manager,managerTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#939-940)
	- token.changeController(consortiumPlaceholder) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#940-941)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- saleFinalized (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#941-942)
	- saleStopped (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#942)

Reentrancy in ArtSale.doPayment (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#884-904):
	External calls:
	- ! token.mint(_subscriber,purchasedTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#896-897)
	External calls sending eth:
	- ! escrow.send(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#895-896)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- subscriptions (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#897-902)

Artcoin.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#692-701)
	- /unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#697-698

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#129-130)
VestedToken.MAX_GRANTS_PER_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0xb4e4a785de5a9caefad3912a1344febf04c7d2ac.sol#437)
